com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.server

Interface ValidationResult


  • public interface ValidationResult
    The interface ValidationResult is used as return type of server connection tests.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ValidationResult.AreaOfFailure
      The ValidationResult.AreaOfFailure describes in which area the failure is located.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ValidationResult.AreaOfFailure getAreaOfFailure() 
      String getDetailedMessage() 
      Throwable getException() 
      String getMessage() 
      boolean wasSuccessful() 

    • Method Detail

      • getMessage

        String getMessage()
        Returns:
        The message describing the failure.

      • getDetailedMessage

        String getDetailedMessage()
        Returns:
        The detailed message describing the failure (if any).

      • getException

        Throwable getException()
        Returns:
        The exception (which has caused the failure) in order to get the stack trace from it.

      • wasSuccessful

        boolean wasSuccessful()
        Returns:
        true, if everything is fine and we do not have to show a failure message. If false show getMessage() and handle failure by displaying the correct area of options: getAreaOfFailure()

      • getAreaOfFailure

        ValidationResult.AreaOfFailure getAreaOfFailure()
        Returns:
        The area of failure to display the correct area of options.
        See: ValidationResult.AreaOfFailure
